001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure.CustomAllureListener;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StorageKeysTest;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.ObjectFormatter;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.Objects;
011import org.apache.logging.log4j.ThreadContext;
012import org.junit.jupiter.api.Order;
013import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterTestExecutionCallback;
014import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
015
016import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure.StepType.TEAR_DOWN;
017import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys.HTML;
018import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys.START_TIME;
019import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.AllureStepHelper.attachFilteredLogsToAllure;
020import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.AllureStepHelper.logTestOutcome;
021import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.AllureStepHelper.setDescription;
022import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.AllureStepHelper.setUpTestMetadata;
023import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.TestContextManager.getSuperQuest;
024
025/**
026 * JUnit 5 {@code AfterTestExecutionCallback} extension for logging test outcomes and attaching logs to Allure reports.
027 *
028 * <p>This extension executes after each test method, logging the test result (success or failure),
029 * calculating execution duration, and appending filtered logs to the Allure report.
030 * </p>
031 *
032 * <p>Logs are filtered based on the test name and extracted from the system log file.
033 * If logs cannot be retrieved, a fallback message is added to Allure.
034 * </p>
035 *
036 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
037 */
038@Order(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
039public class Epilogue implements AfterTestExecutionCallback {
040
041   /**
042    * Executes after test execution to log results and attach filtered logs to Allure.
043    *
044    * @param context The test execution context.
045    */
046   @Override
047   public void afterTestExecution(final ExtensionContext context) {
048      if (!Objects.equals(CustomAllureListener.getActiveStepName(), TEAR_DOWN.getDisplayName())) {
049         CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
050      }
051      setUpTestMetadata(context);
052      SuperQuest superQuest = getSuperQuest(context);
053      Map<Enum<?>, List<Object>> arguments = superQuest.getStorage().sub(StorageKeysTest.ARGUMENTS).getData();
054      String htmlContent = ObjectFormatter.generateHtmlContent(arguments);
055      List<String> htmlList = context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).get(HTML, List.class);
056      if (htmlList == null) {
057         htmlList = new ArrayList<>();
058      }
059      htmlList.add(htmlContent);
060      context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).put(HTML, htmlList);
061      Throwable throwable = context.getExecutionException().orElse(null);
062      String status = (throwable == null) ? "SUCCESS" : "FAILED";
063      long startTime = context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).get(START_TIME, long.class);
064      long durationInSeconds = (System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime) / 1000;
065      logTestOutcome(context.getDisplayName(), status, durationInSeconds, throwable);
066      if (!CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(TEAR_DOWN.getDisplayName())) {
067         CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
068         CustomAllureListener.startStep(TEAR_DOWN);
069      }
070      attachFilteredLogsToAllure(ThreadContext.get("testName"));
071      ThreadContext.remove("testName");
072      setDescription(context);
073      if (CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(TEAR_DOWN.getDisplayName())) {
074         CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
075      }
076   }
077}
